text: Senior House Republican says GOP members ready to block Jordan  —  A number of House Republicans are in talks to block Rep. Jim Jordan's path to the speakership as the Ohio Republican tries to force a floor vote on Tuesday, according to multiple GOP sources.

Jordan Activates Right-Wing Pressure Campaign in Push to Win Speakership  —  Allies of the Ohio Republican, who must persuade scores of his colleagues to support his bid for speaker, are threatening right-wing retribution to any G.O.P. lawmakers who dare oppose him.

Jim Jordan's pressure campaign the ‘dumbest thing you can do,’ one House Republican says  —  Nobody likes a bully, Rep. Dan Crenshaw said.  —  Rep. Dan Crenshaw (R-Texas) has some advice for Rep. Jim Jordan as he and his allies attempt to pressure his way to the speakership:  —  Chill.

House Republicans' Chaos Is Making Biden's Split-Screen Strategy a Lot Easier  —  Biden wants to run on his ability to govern.  House Republicans' inability to do just that plays into the Democrat's 2024 strategy … Joe Biden's reelection strategy relies on painting Republicans as chaotic, disorganized, and unserious.

Biden, DNC raise $71 million in third quarter  —  It's a large, though not record-breaking, amount that has allowed Biden to launch an earlier TV and digital advertising campaign than past presidents' reelection efforts.  —  President Joe Biden, the Democratic National Committee …

Driving 100 miles in labor; giving birth in the ER: Fears rise as 3 maternity units prepare to close in Alabama  —  The state has one of the country's highest maternal mortality rates.  Now, three hospitals plan to stop delivering babies, putting some pregnant women at even higher risk.

GOPer cut off by CNN host for anti-immigrant rant when asked about Gaza refugees  —  During an appearance on CNN on Sunday morning, host Victor Blackwell was forced to shut down a House Republican who took advantage of a question about what to do with Palestinian refugees to attack President Joe Biden over immigration in the U.S.

How hackers piled onto the Israeli-Hamas conflict  —  Lower-level cyberattacks are becoming a major feature of the war between Israel and Hamas, and the attacks could ramp up in intensity.  —  Hackers sympathetic to Hamas are working to make the Israel-Gaza conflict the next front of cyberwarfare.

Mounting debt threatens Mike Pence's campaign  —  Pence's 2024 effort has $1.2 million on hand but has built up $620,000 in debt, a major warning sign for a presidential campaign.  —  Former Vice President Mike Pence's 2024 campaign faces a potentially existential cash squeeze, with debt already piling up.

French teacher stabbed to death in knife attack at school  —  French authorities are treating the incident as a terrorist attack.  —  PARIS — A teacher has been killed and two people wounded in a knife attack Friday at a school in the northern French city of Arras, local media report.
